search_input.description: Board search bar — filters cards by title text in real-time

active_filter_chip.description: Removable filter chip shown when filter active

add_card_global_btn.description: Add Card button triggers card creation form

wip_indicator.description: WIP exceeded indicator — icon + count (non-color indicator)

wip_icon.description: Exclamation icon alongside red WIP text (WCAG 1.4.1)

blocked_warning_icon.description: Warning triangle icon alongside blocked color (WCAG 1.4.1)

card_blocked_1.description: Blocked card visual indicator with icon + border + pulse

card_blocked_question_preview.description: Blocker question preview on card at board level

blocked_age_text.description: Blocker age shown on card (suggestion from review)

card1_keyboard_hint.description: Alt+Arrow keyboard shortcut hint text on card

loading_skeleton_overlay.description: Loading skeleton shown during board initial read

undo_toast.description: Undo toast after drag-drop — 5 second window

undo_btn.description: Undo button reverts card to previous column

parse_warning_badge.description: Warning indicator for skipped malformed cards

unblock_btn.description: Unblock button — disabled when response textarea is empty

blocker_hint_text.description: Hint text shown when response is empty

blocker_response_textarea.description: Response textarea for human unblock answer

title_error_text.description: Inline validation error: Title is required

form_submit_btn.description: Submit disabled when title is empty

open_editor_btn.description: Open board.yaml in editor action for malformed YAML

cms_connecting_overlay.description: Connecting overlay shown during WebSocket handshake

pipeline_bar.description: Pipeline overview bar with per-column card counts

blocked_item_1.description: Blocked item card — read-only in CMS

bi1_readonly_notice.description: Directs user to resolve via VS Code/Slack/Vivian

ap1_feed.description: Scrolling tool call feed for active agent

board-view.description: Main SDLC kanban board with 7 columns — primary human view

card-detail.description: Card detail panel with blocker response area

card-create-form.description: Card creation form with title validation

board-empty-state.description: No .kanban/ directory — show Initialize Board button

board-error-state.description: Malformed board.yaml — show validation error and editor link

cms-ops.description: CMS live ops dashboard — read-only real-time view
